title: Thrashing horror

|   | A seething mass of yellow flesh. It thrashes erratically, staggering foes beneath the weight of its impacts. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Thrashing horrors** are massive heaps of muscle and flesh which tromp about [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), seeking out invaders and smashing them beneath their bulk. They move erratically, like [bats](/Bat "Bat"), and when seriously injured, they can [might](/Might "Might") themselves. They often come in small packs like raijus.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                         |                                                                                                              |
| :---------- | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Slot1       | [Might](/Might "Might") | [Emergency flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- By the time a character is ready for the Abyss, thrashing horrors aren't big threats, even when [mighted](/Might "Might"). But if you're banished to Abyss early (or just low on HP), thrashing horrors can be a huge issue. They are very fast, so it's almost impossible to escape by running.

## History

Thrashing horrors were added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12")

From CrawlWiki

thrashing horror X 
HP 32-66
HD 9
XP 841
Speed 25
AC 5
EV 10
Will 60
Attack1 17 (trample: trample)
Attack2 9 (trample: trample)


Resistances rF+
rC+
rElec
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type thrashing horror, thrashing horror
Flags Unbreathing
Batty
No poly
A seething mass of yellow flesh. It thrashes erratically, staggering foes beneath the weight of its impacts.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Thrashing horrors are massive heaps of muscle and flesh which tromp about the Abyss, seeking out invaders and smashing them beneath their bulk. They move erratically, like bats, and when seriously injured, they can might themselves. They often come in small packs like raijus.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Might Emergency flag,
Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • By the time a character is ready for the Abyss, thrashing horrors aren't big threats, even when mighted. But if you're banished to Abyss early (or just low on HP), thrashing horrors can be a huge issue. They are very fast, so it's almost impossible to escape by running.

History

Thrashing horrors were added in 0.12
